00023 DbEntry::DbEntry() : fPolId(UCHAR_MAX), timeStamp(0), fFields(), fFieldFlags()
00024 {

00050 void DbEntry::PrintAsDbEntry(ostream &o, Bool_t printCommonFields) const
00051 {
00052    o << "["+fRunName+"]" << endl;
00053 
00054    DbFieldMap::const_iterator ifld;
00055    DbFieldMap::const_iterator bfld = fFields.begin();
00056    DbFieldMap::const_iterator efld = fFields.end();
00057 
00058    DbFieldSaveFlagMap::const_iterator ifldFlag = fFieldFlags.begin();
00059 
00060    for (ifld=bfld; ifld!=efld; ifld++, ifldFlag++) {
00061       
00062       if (ifld->second != "none") {
00063          string star = ifldFlag->second ? " *" : " ";
00064          o << "\t" << ifld->first << star << "= " << ifld->second << ";" << endl;
00065       }
00066    }
00067 
00068    o << endl;
00069 }

00073 void DbEntry::ProcessLine(std::string sline)
00074 {
00075    DbFieldMap::iterator ifld;
00076    DbFieldMap::iterator bfld = fFields.begin();
00077    DbFieldMap::iterator efld = fFields.end();
00078 
00079    for (ifld=bfld; ifld!=efld; ifld++) {
00080       //printf("%s=%s\n", ifld->first.c_str(), ifld->second.c_str());
00081       TObjArray *subStrL = TPRegexp("^\\s+"+ifld->first+"\\s*(\\*?)=\\s*(.*)$").MatchS(sline);
00082 
00083       if (subStrL && subStrL->GetEntriesFast() >= 3) {
00084 
00085          // first pattern
00086          TString subStr = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(1))->GetString();
00087 
00088          if (subStr == "*") fFieldFlags[ifld->first] = true;
00089 
00090          // second pattern
00091          subStr = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(2))->GetString();
00092          delete subStrL;
00093 
00094          // remove comments
00095          Ssiz_t npos = subStr.Index("//");
00096          if (npos > 0) subStr.Remove(npos);
00097 
00098          // remove other characters
00099          subStr.Remove(TString::kBoth, ' ');
00100          subStr.Remove(TString::kBoth, '\t');
00101          subStr.Remove(TString::kBoth, ' ');
00102          subStr.Remove(TString::kBoth, '@');
00103          subStr.Remove(TString::kBoth, ';');
00104          subStr.Remove(TString::kBoth, '\"');
00105          subStr.Remove(TString::kBoth, ' ');
00106 
00107          if (subStr.Length() == 0) {
00108             ifld->second = "";
00109          } else if (ifld->first == "DISABLED_BUNCHES" || ifld->first == "EnableBunch" ||
00110             ifld->first == "DISABLED_CHANNELS" || ifld->first == "EnableStrip")
00111          {
00112             if (ifld->second == "none") ifld->second = "";
00113             ifld->second += " ";
00114             ifld->second += subStr;
00115          } else
00116             ifld->second = subStr;
00117       }
00118    }
00119 }

00123 bool DbEntry::operator<(const DbEntry &rhs) const
00124 {
00125    // First, compare by start time
00126    if (timeStamp < rhs.timeStamp) return true;
00127    else if (timeStamp > rhs.timeStamp) return false;
00128 
00129    // If no start time defined (should be 0), compare by run ID
00130    stringstream ss1;
00131    stringstream ss2;
00132 
00133    ss1 << setfill(' ') << setw(20) << right << fRunName;
00134    ss2 << setfill(' ') << setw(20) << right << rhs.fRunName;
00135 
00136    return ss1.str().compare(ss2.str()) < 0;
00137    //return strcmp(fRunName.c_str(), rhs.fRunName.c_str()) < 0;
00138    //return false;
00139 }

00173 void DbEntry::UpdateFields(DbEntry &dbrun)
00174 {
00175    DbFieldMap::iterator ifld;
00176    DbFieldMap::iterator bfld = dbrun.fFields.begin();
00177    DbFieldMap::iterator efld = dbrun.fFields.end();
00178 
00179    for (ifld=bfld; ifld!=efld; ifld++) {
00180 
00181       string &field_name  = (string &) ifld->first;
00182       string &field_value = (string &) ifld->second;
00183 
00184       //printf("name, value: %s, %s\n", field_name.c_str(), field_value.c_str());
00185 
00186       bool flag_from = dbrun.fFieldFlags[field_name];
00187       bool flag_to   = fFieldFlags[field_name];
00188 
00189       // For the same run all values are copied
00190       if (fRunName == dbrun.fRunName) {
00191          fFields[field_name] = field_value;
00192          fFieldFlags[field_name] = flag_from;
00193 
00194       } else {
00195          if (!flag_from && !flag_to && field_value != "none") {
00196             fFields[field_name] = field_value;
00197          }
00198       }
00199    }
00200 
00201    UpdateValues();
00202 }
00203

00206 void DbEntry::UpdateValues()
00207 {
00208    stringstream sstr;
00209    sstr.str(""); sstr << fFields["POLARIMETER_ID"]; sstr >> fPolId;
00210    sstr.str(""); sstr << fFields["START_TIME"];     sstr >> timeStamp;
00211 }

00225    DbFieldMap::const_iterator bfld = fFields.begin();
00226    DbFieldMap::const_iterator efld = fFields.end();

00229 
00230       string &field_name  = (string &) ifld->first;
00231       string &field_value = (string &) ifld->second;
00232       fprintf(f, "$rc['%s']                = \"%s\";\n", field_name.c_str(), field_value.c_str());
